data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
XPS(XML Paper Specification) is a new document format used by
    Microsoft printing system. It's a PDF-like static document format.

    XPS document is supposed to be created and manipulated through
    WinFX (.NET 3.0) interface.

    This Perl module provides a Perlish interface to generate and parse
    XPS documents.

    Because XPS is largely an extension based on XML markup and packed
    in a ZIP file, I choose the module name to be under XML root
    namespace.
